item.title: 1.24.4-do.0
item.description: First 1.24.x release Updates to system components: Updated to Kubernetes v1.24.4 The feature-gate: LegacyServiceAccountTokenNoAutoGeneration is disabled. This feature was moved to Beta in Kubernetes 1.

item.description: Updates to system components: Updated to Kubernetes v1.22.12 Updated to etcd v3.4.19 Updated to DO CSI v3.1.0 Updated to external-provisioner v2.2.2 Updated to external-attacher v3.

item.description: First 1.23.x release Updates to system components: Updated to Kubernetes v1.23.9 Changes to system components: Updated to DO CSI v4.2.0 Updated to external-provisioner v3.2.1 Updated to external-attacher v3.

item.title: 1.21.14-do.0
item.description: Updates to system components: Updated to kernel to Linux 5.10.120. This is an upgrade from Linux 4.19 on earlier DOKS 1.21 patch versions. This upgrade is necessary to address a limitation in BPF program size on kernels prior to Linux 5.

item.title: 1.22.11-do.0
item.description: Updates to system components: Updated kernel to Linux 5.10.120. Updated to Kubernetes v1.22.11 Updated to etcd v3.5.4 Changes to system components: Disabled Cilium’s eBPF-based NodePort handling in favor of kube-proxy as it does not support graceful termination properly in v1.

item.title: 1.21.11-do.1
item.description: Upgrades to system components: Updated to DO CCM v0.1.37

item.title: 1.22.8-do.1
item.description: Upgrades to system components: Updated to DO CCM v0.1.37 Updated to etcd v3.5.3

item.title: 1.21.11-do.0
item.description: IMPORTANT Please upgrade as soon as possible as this version contains an important security update for containerd. Upgrades to system components: Updated to containerd v1.

item.title: 1.22.8-do.0
item.description: IMPORTANT Please upgrade as soon as possible as this version contains an important security update for containerd. Upgrades to system components: Updated to containerd v1.

item.title: 1.20.15-do.1
item.description: Fixes to system components: Reverted back to Linux kernel-image-4.19.0-17-amd64, after unintentional implicit upgrade to Linux kernel-image-4.19.0-18-amd64 which contains eBPF regressions with respect to Cilium.

item.title: 1.21.10-do.0
item.description: Upgrades to system components: Updated to Kubernetes v1.21.10 Upgraded Docker to 20.10.12. Reverted back to Linux kernel-image-4.19.0-17-amd64, after unintentional implicit upgrade to Linux kernel-image-4.19.0-18-amd64 which contains regressions impacting Cilium.

item.title: 1.22.7-do.0
item.description: First 1.22.x release Upgrades to system components: Updated to Kubernetes v1.22.7 IMPORTANT The following deprecated upstream beta APIs have been removed in 1.22 in favor of the GA version of those APIs: APIService CertificateSigningRequest CustomResourceDefinition Ingress IngressClass Lease PriorityClass RBAC Storage SubjectAccessReview TokenReview ValidatingWebhookConfiguration & MutatingWebhookConfiguration Fix --enable-admission-plugins flag to kube-apiserver.

item.title: 1.20.15-do.0
item.description: Upgrades to system components: Updated to Kubernetes v1.20.15 Updated to Cilium 1.9.10 Improved configuration to prevent a number of connectivity issues Added arp-flusher sidecar to the cilium agent which periodically clears potentially stale ARP records Updated to containerd v1.

item.title: 1.21.9-do.0
item.description: Upgrades to system components: Updated to Kubernetes v1.21.9 Updated to Cilium 1.10.4 Improved configuration to prevent a number of connectivity issues Added arp-flusher sidecar to the cilium agent which periodically clears potentially stale ARP records Updated to DO CSI v3.

item.title: 1.19.15-do.0
item.description: Upgrades to system components: Updated to Kubernetes v1.19.15 Updated to DO CCM v0.1.35 Supports specifying the number of nodes to create a Load Balancer with

item.description: Upgrades to system components: Updated to Kubernetes v1.20.11 Updated to DO CCM v0.1.35 Supports specifying the number of nodes to create a Load Balancer with

item.title: 1.20.9-do.0
item.description: Upgrades to system components: Updated to Kubernetes v1.20.9 Updated to DO CCM v0.1.34 Updated to DO CSI v2.1.2 Updated to containerd v1.4.9

item.title: 1.21.3-do.0
item.description: Upgrades to system components: Updated to Kubernetes v1.21.3 Updated to DO CCM v0.1.34 Updated to DO CSI v2.1.2 Updated to containerd v1.4.9 Disabled the Cilium enabled-bpf-masquerade option to address Cilium error on clusters using hostNetwork Ensured that ARP cache entries marked as PERMANENT are cleared by Cilium before establishing connections with a new control plane Droplet

item.title: 1.21.2-do.2
item.description: Changes to system components: Disabled the Cilium enable-egress-gateway option to address Cilium startup error on clusters using VXLAN tunneling

item.title: 1.21.2-do.1
item.description: Changes to system components: Disabled Cilium full kube-proxy replacement and restored partial mode to address failing Istio sidecar injection

item.title: 1.19.12-do.0
item.description: Upgrades to system components: Updated to Kubernetes v1.19.12 Updated to CoreDNS v1.8.4 Updated CSI driver sidecars: Updated to external-provisioner v2.2.1 Updated to external-attacher v3.2.1 Updated to external-snapshotter v3.

item.title: 1.20.8-do.0
item.description: Upgrades to system components: Updated to Kubernetes v1.20.8 Updated to CoreDNS v1.8.4 Updated CSI driver sidecars: Updated to external-provisioner v2.2.1 Updated to external-attacher v3.2.1 Updated to external-snapshotter v3.

item.title: 1.21.2-do.0
item.description: First 1.21.x release Upgrades to system components: Updated to Cilium 1.10.1 Enabled full kube-proxy replacement Enabled the enable-egress-gateway and enable-bpf-masquerade options to allow use of Cilium’s egress gateway feature Updated to CoreDNS v1.

item.title: 1.18.19-do.0
item.description: Upgrades to system components: Updated to Kubernetes 1.18.19 Fixes CVE-2021-25735 Fixes CVE-2021-3121 Updated to Cilium 1.7.16 Fixes CVE-2021-28682, CVE-2021-28683 and CVE-2021-29258 Updated to Linux kernel-image-4.

item.title: 1.19.6-do.0
item.description: Upgrades to system components: Updated to Cilium 1.9.1 Enabled the remote-node-identity feature of Cilium, to aid in migration away from VXLAN Switched to the cluster-pool IPAM mode from the deprecated hostpool-legacy mode Updated to CoreDNS v1.

item.title: 1.20.2-do.0
item.description: Starting with DigitalOcean Kubernetes 1.20, containerd is used as the container runtime. Previous releases used Docker. This change reflects the upstream deprecation of dockershim and deprecation of Docker as a container runtime in Kubernetes 1.

item.title: 1.17.13-do.3
item.description: Mitigated a potential kernel deadlock by disabling frame buffer mode for the video console.

item.title: 1.18.10-do.3
item.description: Upgrades to system components: Updated to external-provisioner v2.0.4 Updated to external-attacher v3.0.2 Mitigated CVE-2020-8569 by updating to external-snapshotter v3.0.2 Updated to external-resizer v1.0.1 Mitigated a potential kernel deadlock by disabling frame buffer mode for the video console.

item.title: 1.19.3-do.3
item.description: Upgrades to system components: Updated to external-provisioner v2.0.4 Updated to external-attacher v3.0.2 Mitigated CVE-2020-8569 by updating to external-snapshotter v3.0.2 Updated to external-resizer v1.0.1 Cilium will configure new clusters (initially created with 1.

item.title: 1.18.10-do.1
item.description: Upgrades to system components: Updated to CSI driver v2.1.1 Added --default-fstype=ext4 to csi-provisioner fixing fsGroup bug Updated to Cilium 1.7.11 Updated to DO CCM v0.

item.title: 1.19.3-do.1
item.description: Upgrades to system components: Updated to CSI driver v2.1.1 Added --default-fstype=ext4 to csi-provisioner fixing fsGroup bug Updated to Cilium 1.8.5 Dropped parameters bpf-ct-global-tcp-max and bpf-ct-global-any-max to address Cilium issue #13843 Updated to DO CCM v0.

item.title: 1.19.3-do.0
item.description: Starting with DigitalOcean Kubernetes 1.19, the NodePort range 30000-32767 is not open by default anymore. Instead, a new controller automatically manages access through the firewall based on the Services of type NodePort currently defined in the cluster.

item.description: Upgrades to system components: Updated to etcd v3.3.22 Updated to Cilium v1.7.5 Updated to DO CCM v0.1.26 Added support for migrating load balancers across clusters (see the guide for details) Updated to DOKS Cluster Autoscaler v1.

item.title: 1.18.3-do.0
item.description: Important Upgrade Notes For Volume Snapshot Users Starting with DigitalOcean Kubernetes 1.18, alpha versions of volume snapshots are no longer supported. If existing volume snapshots meet the upgrade requirements, they will be converted automatically to the beta version of a volume snapshot when upgrading a cluster to 1.
